articles.title: UltraTech-India Cements deal: what next for Dhoni, Srinivasan and CSK? - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Srinivasan family will continue to control the IPL team but lose hold in ICL; whether Dhoni will play next season is conditional to number of retentions permitted by BCCI
articles.content:
MS Dhoni's future as a player at CSK could depend on the No. of retentions allowed © BCCI/IPL
The proposed acquisition of India Cements Ltd (ICL) by UltraTech Cement, announced on Sunday (July 28), … [+4070 chars]

articles.author: Cody Corrall
articles.title: OpenAI comes for Google with SearchGPT - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI is testing SearchGPT, a new AI search experience to compete directly with Google. The feature aims to elevate search queries with “timely answers”
articles.content: OpenAI is testing SearchGPT, a new AI search experience to compete directly with Google. The feature aims to elevate search queries with timely answers from across the internet and allows the user to… [+4761 chars]
